Row.Text: Noah Webster would like to compile all of the words in our language into one book. He needs support to do so... [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Connecticut [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be in the Rennaissance Era or later [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Great Scientist appears
We have commissioned a dictionary... [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Great Scientist appears

Our people want a legal document to guide our affairs. They propose a constitution called the Fundamental Orders... [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Connecticut [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be in the Rennaissance Era or earlier [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Cul} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All cities celebrate WLTK Day [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Golden Age begins
We have formed the Fundamental Orders... [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All cities celebrate WLTK Day [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Golden Age begins
